# `FormListPickerSection` Definition

Section within a list picker

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | No | Title of the section |
| multipleSelection | `boolean` | Yes | Whether multiple items can be selected |
| items | [`FormListPickerItem[]`](formlistpickeritem-definition.md) | Yes | Items in this section |
